definition: The term refers to something that can be anticipated or predicted in advance. It is commonly used to describe events, situations, or outcomes that are foreseeable or expected to happen based on prior knowledge or experience.

examples.german: Es war vorhersehbar, dass er zu spät kommen würde.
examples.english: It was foreseeable that he would arrive late.

examples.german: Es ist vorhersehbar, dass sich die Situation verschlechtern wird.
examples.english: It is predictable that the situation will worsen.

examples.german: Die Handlung des Films war sehr vorhersehbar.
examples.english: The plot of the movie was very predictable.
